mapper.sql: a.order_id AS "orderId", a.order_state AS "orderState", a.brand_id AS "brandId", a.brand_name AS "brandName", a.goods_nbr AS "goodsNbr", a.goods_size AS "goodsSize", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.channel_name AS "channelName", a.channel_user_id AS "channelUserId", a.channel_user_name AS "channelUserName", a.discount AS "discount", a.fact_discount AS "factDiscount", a.cust_name AS "custName", a.cust_addr AS "custAddr", a.cust_tel AS "custTel", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.order_state_time AS "orderStateTime", a.order_user_id AS "orderUserId", a.order_user_name AS "orderUserName", a.check_user_id AS "checkUserId", a.check_user_name AS "checkUserName", a.carr_id AS "carrId", a.ems_comp AS "emsComp", a.ems_id AS "emsId", a.ems_price AS "emsPrice", a.remark AS "remark", a.order_ip AS "orderIp", a.goods_type_id AS "goodsTypeId", a.goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", a.order_price_pre AS "orderPricePre", a.order_price AS "orderPrice", a.order_fahuo_state AS "orderFahuoState", a.fact_goods_count AS "factGoodsCount", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.tid AS "tid", a.numiid AS "numiid", a.province_name AS "provinceName", a.province_id AS "provinceId", a.inven_id AS "invenId", a.platform_freight AS "platformFreight", a.platform_agio AS "platformAgio", a.ori_nbr AS "oriNbr", a.ori_size AS "oriSize", a.custom_order_id AS "customOrderId", a.order_parent_id AS "orderParentId", a.city_id AS "cityId", a.city_name AS "cityName", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.area_name AS "areaName", a51.name AS "area.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a51 ON a51.id = a.area_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_shopping_cart( order_id, order_state, brand_id, brand_name, goods_nbr, goods_size, goods_count, goods_price, channel_id, channel_name, channel_user_id, channel_user_name, discount, fact_discount, cust_name, cust_addr, cust_tel, order_time, order_state_time, order_user_id, order_user_name, check_user_id, check_user_name, carr_id, ems_comp, ems_id, ems_price, remark, order_ip, goods_type_id, goods_type_name, order_price_pre, order_price, order_fahuo_state, fact_goods_count, shop_id, shop_name, tid, numiid, province_name, province_id, inven_id, platform_freight, platform_agio, ori_nbr, ori_size, custom_order_id, order_parent_id, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{orderState}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{goodsNbr}, #{goodsSize}, #{goodsCount}, #{goodsPrice}, #{channelId}, #{channelName}, #{channelUserId}, #{channelUserName}, #{discount}, #{factDiscount}, #{custName}, #{custAddr}, #{custTel}, #{orderTime}, #{orderStateTime}, #{orderUserId}, #{orderUserName}, #{checkUserId}, #{checkUserName}, #{carrId}, #{emsComp}, #{emsId}, #{emsPrice}, #{remark}, #{orderIp}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{goodsTypeName}, #{orderPricePre}, #{orderPrice}, #{orderFahuoState}, #{factGoodsCount}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{tid}, #{numiid}, #{provinceName}, #{provinceId}, #{invenId}, #{platformFreight}, #{platformAgio}, #{oriNbr}, #{oriSize}, #{customOrderId}, #{orderParentId}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{area.id}, #{areaName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_shopping_cart SET order_id = #{orderId}, order_state = #{orderState}, brand_id = #{brandId}, brand_name = #{brandName}, goods_nbr = #{goodsNbr}, goods_size = #{goodsSize}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, channel_id = #{channelId}, channel_name = #{channelName}, channel_user_id = #{channelUserId}, channel_user_name = #{channelUserName}, discount = #{discount}, fact_discount = #{factDiscount}, cust_name = #{custName}, cust_addr = #{custAddr}, cust_tel = #{custTel}, order_time = #{orderTime}, order_state_time = #{orderStateTime}, order_user_id = #{orderUserId}, order_user_name = #{orderUserName}, check_user_id = #{checkUserId}, check_user_name = #{checkUserName}, carr_id = #{carrId}, ems_comp = #{emsComp}, ems_id = #{emsId}, ems_price = #{emsPrice}, remark = #{remark}, order_ip = #{orderIp}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId}, goods_type_name = #{goodsTypeName}, order_price_pre = #{orderPricePre}, order_price = #{orderPrice}, order_fahuo_state = #{orderFahuoState}, fact_goods_count = #{factGoodsCount}, shop_id = #{shopId}, shop_name = #{shopName}, tid = #{tid}, numiid = #{numiid}, province_name = #{provinceName}, province_id = #{provinceId}, inven_id = #{invenId}, platform_freight = #{platformFreight}, platform_agio = #{platformAgio}, ori_nbr = #{oriNbr}, ori_size = #{oriSize}, custom_order_id = #{customOrderId}, order_parent_id = #{orderParentId}, city_id = #{cityId}, city_name = #{cityName}, area_id = #{area.id}, area_name = #{areaName} WHERE id = #{id}
